item.title: [Essay] The Simulation Argument
item.description:
Nick Bostrom proposes that we are living inside a computer simulation with a 1 in 3 probability.

It’s easy to get the basic idea of the argument, but it’s also widely misunderstood. If you read it, read carefully.
